articles.title: Atlanta spa shooter who targeted Asian women pleads guilty to four of eight murders - CNBC
articles.description: A Georgia man has plead guilty on Tuesday to four murders related to the shootings at three metro Atlanta spas where eight people died, six of whom were of Asian descent.

articles.author: Karen Tee
articles.title: Can investing in Southeast Asian art really make you money? - CNA - CNA
articles.description: As global interest in art from this underrated region grows, owning local art could turn out to be a savvy investment – but only if you have the passion and patience. We speak to art gallery owners and auction houses to find out more.
